arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللّٰهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيْ رَجَبٍ وَشَعْبَانَ
وَلَا تَجْعَلْ حَظَّنَا مِنْهُ الْجُوعَ وَالْعَطَشَ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah, Please bless us in Rajab and Sha`ban.
and bring us to the month of Ramadhan,
and assist us in fasting, and worshipping,
to be careful in our speech,,
and turning the eyes from the unlawful..
let our only share of it not be hunger and thirst!”.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
allāhumma bārik lanā fī rajabin washa`bān
walā taj`al ḥaẓẓanā minhul jū`a wal`aṭash
